dict.string: Your are exempt from all of your dental treatment costs
Your employer covers the cost of your dental treatment
You make a regular weekly payment to cover your dental treatment (capitation scheme, cash plan, treatment loan, credit agreement)
You make a regular monthly payment to cover your dental treatment (capitation scheme, cash plan, treatment loan, credit agreement)
You make a regular quarterly payment to cover your dental treatment (capitation scheme, cash plan, treatment loan, credit agreement)
You make a regular annual payment to cover your dental treatment (capitation scheme, cash plan, treatment loan, credit agreement)
You pay for the treatment you receive at the end of each appointment
You pay for the treatment you receive at the end of a course of treatment
